      • setLayoutDirection

        public static void setLayoutDirection​(android.view.View view,
                                      int layoutDirection)
        4.2的系统不设置.可能造成resolveRtlPropertiesIfNeeded()调用次数过多卡顿
        参数:
        view - 需要设置的控件
        layoutDirection - normally View.LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR
